message: I propose dividing the money with a 70-30 split in favor of Alice. This allows us to share the wealth while still giving me a larger portion to start.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a fair split.
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted our proposal to a 60-40 split. I believe this maintains fairness while adapting to the changing value of money.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share due to the risks and uncertainties of the game.
